Regulation Name(s): Nucleic acid-based in vitro diagnostic devices for the detection of Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex and the genetic mutations associated with Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex antibiotic resistance in respiratory specimens
Analyte(s): rpoB gene mutations associated with rifampin resistance
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Cepheid Xpert MTB/RIF real-time PCR assay for detection of Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex DNA and rifampin resistance mutations in sputum using GeneXpert systems
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative nested real-time PCR test for detecting Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex DNA and rifampin resistance mutations in sputum from patients with suspected pulmonary tuberculosis, intended to aid diagnosis and inform airborne infection isolation decisions, used in conjunction with clinical and laboratory findings
